meanings.definition: Sniffling (verb): To breathe noisily through the nose due to a cold or crying.
meanings.sent1: She was sniffling loudly after catching a cold.
meanings.sent2: The child was sniffling because of the chilly weather.
meanings.sent3: Even the dog seemed to be sniffling at the sad movie.
meanings.sent4: The sound of sniffling in the quiet room was like a gentle breeze.
meanings.sent5: His constant sniffling was a clear sign of his allergies.

meanings.definition: Sniffling (adjective): Having a runny or congested nose.
meanings.sent1: She used a tissue to wipe her sniffling nose.
meanings.sent2: The sniffling sound coming from her was quite noticeable.
meanings.sent3: The sniffling kitten looked up with watery eyes.
meanings.sent4: The room was filled with the scent of sniffling flowers.
meanings.sent5: His sniffling nose made him sound like a trumpet player.
